amendment.description: To require an evaluation of the Gulf Coast Claims Facility.

vote.text: Amendment SA 898 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 898 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR 10/20/2011 S6850; text: CR 10/20/2011 S6850) To require an evaluation of the Gulf Coast Claims Facility.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 898 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Rubio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 898 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
